entry.body:
import Details from "@w/Details.astro";
import MDXLayer from "@l/MDXLayer.astro";
import Widget from "@w/Widget.astro";
import MDXJS from "@w/MDXJS.astro";

<MDXLayer title={frontmatter.title} description={frontmatter.description}>
<Widget img={frontmatter.img} skeleton={false}>
<MDXJS>



## Information

The S&P 500 index is a stock market index that tracks ~500 of the largest U.S. companies by market capitalization. 
The index is a product of S&P Dow Jones Indices which is a joint venture of S&P Global and CME Group.

---



## Notes

These are the collection of notes for the SPY 500 MDX Document.

### Log

- [x] Add Charts for $SPY
- [ ] Add tabs with charts!

### Journal


<Details data="J1">

#### J1
##### 2023-04-14
Testing the charts for $SPY

</Details>

</MDXJS>
</Widget>
</MDXLayer>

data.title: SPY
data.description: SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust that tracks the 500 largest U.S companies through S&P Dow Jones Index.
data.author: KBVE Team
